content: this beginner friendly pattern uses super bulky yarn and adorable details to help you make every girl s best friend - an emotional support pickle he may be just a little plush pickle but he s kind of a big dill he may not be girl dinner but he won t judge you for girl dinner he just hopes you love him warts and all while the piece is worked mostly in simple single_crochet stitches please read all pattern notes for additional stitches and information
